Posts.EditableText:
hello

there are mainly 2 things i want to know. 1. is there a full list of commands that can be used in the stories? i mean like "give X item" "use X item" and etc. i know that the ones used in a story will appear on the right or left side depending on where the person has put their info bar at but I am wondering because I am wondering what other commands might be in a story that are not displayed. something you wouldn't expect to happen, like if you tried to give an item to the wrong person. 2. is it possible to find out what commands the person who made the story used? read above, I know the ones to be used right now at a certain point you are will be displayed but I am wondering about the other ones they do not tell you about.
